TI: [Caspase-3 inhibition blocks long-term potentiation in hippocampal slices].
AB: Incubation of hippocampal slices with Z-DEVD-FMK, a specific inhibitor of caspase-3, elicits a time dependent decrease in long-term potentiation (LTP). After 4 hours or later after the incubation with Z-DEVD-FMK the tetanization fails to induce LTP. However, Z-DEVD-FMK does not affect basal indices of synaptic plasticity and short-term plasticity (population spike amplitudes and paired pulse facilitation). The results are the first evidence for the involvement of caspase-3-mediated mechanisms in long-term potentiation phenomenon.
AD: Institute of Higher Nervous Activity and Neurophysiology, Russian Academy of Sciences, Moscow.
TT: Ingibirovanie kaspazy-3 blokiruet dlitel'nuiu potentsiatsiiu v srezakh gippokampa.
TA: Zh Vyssh Nerv Deiat Im I P Pavlova
JT: Zhurnal vysshei nervnoi deiatelnosti imeni I P Pavlova
SO: Zh Vyssh Nerv Deiat Im I P Pavlova. 2003 Sep-Oct;53(5):537-40.
